Xiaotong Luo

Ph.D. Student
Xiamen University
xiaotluo@stu.xmu.edu.edu


About Me

I’m currently a fourth year PhD student at the Xiamen University, supervised by Prof. Yanyun Qu. I received my M.Eng degree from Xiamen University in 2020, supervised by Prof. Cuihua Li. Before that, I received the B.Eng degree from the Department of Electronic Information Science and Technology, Xiamen University in 2017.

My research interests include but are not limited to: low-level vision, image super-resolution, dehazing and image generation.

Now I am looking for a teaching and research position.

Publications

  1. AdaFormer: Efficient Transformer with Adaptive Token Sparsification for Image Super-resolution
    Xiaotong Luo, Zekun Ai, Qiuyuan Liang, Ding Liu, Yuan Xie, Yanyun Qu, Yun Fu
    Thirty-Eighth AAAI Conference on Artificial Intelligence (AAAI), 2024.
    Oral Presentation

  2. SkipDiff: Adaptive Skip Diffusion Model for High-fidelity Perceptual Image Super-resolution
    Xiaotong Luo, Yuan Xie, Yanyun Qu, Yun Fu
    Thirty-Eighth AAAI Conference on Artificial Intelligence (AAAI), 2024.

  3. Learning Re-sampling Methods with Parameter Attribution for Image Super-resolution
    Xiaotong Luo, Yuan Xie, Yanyun Qu
    Neural Information Processing Systems (NeurIPS), 2023.

  4. Memory-friendly Scalable Super-resolution via Rewinding Lottery Ticket Hypothesis
    Jin Lin, Xiaotong Luo, Ming Hong, Yanyun Qu, Yuan Xie, Zongze Wu
    IEEE Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition (CVPR), 2023.

  5. Adjustable Memory-efficient Image Super-resolution via Individual Kernel Sparsity
    Xiaotong Luo, Mingliang Dai, Yulun Zhang, Yuan Xie, Ding Liu, Yanyun Qu, Yun Fu, Junping Zhang
    ACM International Conference on Multimedia (ACM MM), 2022.

  6. Lattice Network for Lightweight Image Restoration
    Xiaotong Luo, Mingliang Dai, Yulun Zhang, Yuan Xie, Ding Liu, Yanyun Qu, Yun Fu, Junping Zhang
    IEEE Transactions on Pattern Analysis and Machine Intelligence (TPAMI), 2022.

  7. Boosting lightweight Single Image Super-resolution via Joint-distillation
    Xiaotong Luo, Qiuyuan Liang, Ding Liu, Yanyun Qu
    ACM International Conference on Multimedia (ACM MM), 2021.

  8. LatticeNet: Towards Lightweight Image Super-Resolution with Lattice Block
    Xiaotong Luo, Yuan Xie, Yulun Zhang, Yanyun Qu, Cuihua Li, Yun Fu
    European Conference on Computer Vision (ECCV), 2020.
